TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyStore extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class represents a storage facility for cryptographic keys and certificates.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetCertificateAlias(class Java.Security.Cert.Certificate cert) cil managed

Docs.param: the certificate to match with.
Docs.summary: Returns the (alias) name of the first keystore entry whose certificate matches the given certificate.
Docs.returns: the alias name of the first entry with a matching certificate, or null if no such entry exists in this keystore.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Security.Cert.Certificate[] GetCertificateChain(string alias) cil managed

Docs.param: the alias name
Docs.summary: Returns the certificate chain associated with the given alias.
Docs.returns: the certificate chain (ordered with the user's certificate first followed by zero or more certificate authorities), or null if the given alias does not exist or does not contain a certificate chain

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Security.IKey GetKey (string alias, char[] password);
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Security.IKey GetKey(string alias, char[] password) cil managed

Docs.param: the alias name
the password for recovering the key
Docs.summary: Returns the key associated with the given alias, using the given password to recover it.
Docs.returns: the requested key, or null if the given alias does not exist or does not identify a key-related entry.

if the algorithm for recovering the key is not available.
if the key can not be recovered.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsCertificateEntry(string alias) cil managed

Docs.param: the alias for the keystore entry to be checked
Docs.summary: Returns true if the entry identified by the given alias was created by a call to setCertificateEntry, or created by a call to setEntry with a TrustedCertificateEntry.
Docs.returns: true if the entry identified by the given alias contains a trusted certificate, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this KeyStore is not initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsKeyEntry(string alias) cil managed

Docs.param: the alias for the keystore entry to be checked
Docs.summary: Returns true if the entry identified by the given alias was created by a call to setKeyEntry, or created by a call to setEntry with a PrivateKeyEntry or a SecretKeyEntry.
Docs.returns: true if the entry identified by the given alias is a key-related entry, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this KeyStore is not initialized.
